4 Day Split - 5/3/1 Method

Monday - Upper SetsxReps Wednesday - Lower SetsxReps Friday - Upper SetsxReps Saturday - Lower SetsxReps
Bench Press 3x5/3/1 Squat 3x5/3/1 Overhead Press 3x5/3/1 Deadlift 3x5/3/1
Incline Bench Press 3x8-10 Romanian Deadlift 3x8-10 Dumbbell Bench 4x8-12 Hack Squat 4x8-12
Pendlay Row 4x8-10 Leg Press 4x8-10 Lat-Pulldown 4x8-12 Leg Extension 4x12-15
Weighted Pull-up 4x8-10 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15 Cable Row 4x8-12 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15
Close Grip Bench 3x8-10 Bicep Curl 3x12-15 Tricep Pushdown 3x12-15 Bicep Curl 3x12-15
Upright Row 4x8-12 Lateral Raises 4x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 4x12-15 Hammer Curl 3x12-15
Calf Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 3x12-15 Calf Raises 3x12-15
